events.name: onChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the navbar menu toggle is pressed.
events.description_zh: 按下导航栏菜单切换时调用的处理程序。

:icon.description: The icon to render as the navbar menu toggle.
:icon.description_zh: 要呈现为导航栏菜单切换的图标。

isSelected.description: Whether the navbar menu toggle is selected. (controlled)
isSelected.description_zh: 是否选择了导航栏菜单切换。（受控）

defaultSelected.description: Whether the navbar menu toggle is selected by default. (uncontrolled)
defaultSelected.description_zh: 是否默认选择导航栏菜单切换。（不受控制）

srOnlyText.description: The text to be used by screen readers.
srOnlyText.description_zh: 屏幕阅读器要使用的文本。
